segments.speaker: Alex
segments.text: Welcome to Crypto Daily, your premier source for all things cryptocurrency! I'm Alex, joined today by my co-host Morgan. We've got some exciting developments to cover in today's show.

segments.speaker: Morgan
segments.text: Thanks, Alex! The crypto market has been on quite a rollercoaster lately. Bitcoin has shown remarkable resilience, hovering around the $62,000 mark despite recent regulatory challenges.
